CAREER SUMMARY
Regional Sales Manager TR, IL & AZ
February 2018 - Present
Directed Automotive Aftermarket Distribution and OEM channels, restructuring the customer landscape in Turkey, Israel, and Azerbaijan.
Served as the Key Account Manager for LED devices (semiconductor) and lamp sales to Tier 1 companies.
Enrolled and managed a Digital B2B sales platform, contributing to streamlined processes.
Held responsibilities as a board member, overseeing a team of 7 direct reports.
Successfully launched new brands and products, demonstrating adaptability and market understanding.

CAREER SUMMARY
Regional Sales Manager TR, IL & AZ
February 2018 - Present
Directed Automotive Aftermarket Distribution and OEM channels, restructuring the customer landscape in Turkey, Israel, and Azerbaijan.
Served as the Key Account Manager for LED devices (semiconductor) and lamp sales to Tier 1 companies.
Enrolled and managed a Digital B2B sales platform, contributing to streamlined processes.
Held responsibilities as a board member, overseeing a team of 7 direct reports.
Successfully launched new brands and products, demonstrating adaptability and market understanding.
Established E-commerce and OES channels, enhancing market reach.
Developed and executed market access strategies, resulting in a notable revenue increase of over 50%.
Automotive Country Manager (TR & IL)
GE Lighting | February 2015 - January 2018
Led Turkey & Israel sales, reporting to the Sales General Manager.
Managed GE Lighting's local company with 10 direct reports.
Drove business development initiatives and managed aftermarket distributors.
Provided sales, marketing, and quality support for OEM and Aftermarket customers.
Globally managed key accounts of automotive OEMs, negotiating annual prices and ensuring customer satisfaction.
Implemented brand and marketing strategies tailored to local markets.
SUMMARY
Strategic and results-oriented Sales and Business Development Manager with a proven track record in steering cross-functional teams and driving revenue growth. Proven success in implementing market access strategies, fostering key account relationships, and consistently exceeding sales targets in various markets.
For further information please contact Jan Johnston on 01695 570 696 or email janj@johnston-vere.co.uk

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
